[hackerrank solution] Staircase

2017-08-03 00:00:00 +0900

solution

function main() {
  var n = parseInt(readLine());
  
  var space = ' '
  var symbol = '#'
  
  var result = []
  for(var i = 0;i<n;i++){
    result.push(space.repeat(n-i-1)+symbol.repeat(i+1))
  }
  
  console.log(result.join('\n'))

}
